data.title: How do I create variable variables?
data.content:
<p>How do I create <a href="http://us3.php.net/manual/en/language.variables.variable.php" rel="nofollow noreferrer"><em>variable variable names</em></a> in Python?</p>
<p>I hear this is a bad idea in general though, and it is a security hole in PHP. Is that true?</p>
